content: qq uu iicckk mm aa kk n no o- - ee s s e e w w f f r re ee e p p a a t t t t e e r r n n - b y c u m ita - yyoouu llll nneeeedd this stuff these deets fine cotton yarn 2 in white r nds - round s scrap yarn in different colors magic_ring - magic_ring to embroider the face i use single_crochet - single_crochet cotton increase - increase 3 mm n°3 hook decrease - decrease fiberfill stuffing slip_stitch - slip_stitch scissors chain - chain blunt needle half_double_crochet - half_double_crochet stitch markers flo - front loop only 🫶 © 2024 cumita - this pattern is for personal use only c mon be nice yes sell your finished plushies please credit cumita for the design lleett tthhee ssttiittcchhiinngg bbeeggiinn r 1 - 6 single_crochet in magic_ring r 2 - increase x 6 12 r 3 - 1 single_crochet increase x 6 18 r 4 - 2 single_crochet increase x 6 24 r 5 - 3 single_crochet increase x 6 30 r 6 - 4 single_crochet increase x 6 36 r 7 to 11 - 36 single_crochet repeat 5 rnds ⇢ in r 12 we ll make two sets of 2 increases to shape the cheeks - one on each side of the face 9 sts apart r 12 - 12 single_crochet 2 increase 9 single_crochet 2 increase 11 single_crochet 40 r 13 - 40 single_crochet jump to the next page 🦷🦷🦷 to make the teeth nnooww ffoorr tthhee tteeeetthh ⇢ in r 14 we ll make three tooths separated by 1 single_crochet each to make a tooth all sts will be done in the flo of the same stitch -we ll call it base st work 1 slip_stitch in the base st 1 chain 1 half_double_crochet in the base stitch 1 chain 1 slip_stitch in the base st pro tip as you work your teeth place a marker on the back loop of each tooth and the single_crochet in between -5 markers in total you ll be glad in r 15 r 14 - 18 single_crochet tooth in flo 1 single_crochet tooth in flo 1 single_crochet tooth in flo 17 single_crochet 40 now pause your work and jump to the next page to see how to 🙂 embroider the face slip_stitch chain half_double_crochet single_crochet ttoo eemmbbrrooiiddeerr don t count the crochet stitches themselves but rather the spaces between them -we ll call them points pts some tips use these points as entry and exit points for the embroidery stitches this pattern will use basic straight stitches always come in and out through the same two points and repeat until your detail reaches the desired width make the embroiderystitches fairly tight guide the thread to the sides of your first stitch otherwise the stitches may start to pile up on each other you re good to go lleett slip_stitch ssttaarrtt wwiitthh tthhee nnoossee the nose will be
